items.answer: We accommodate both small custom orders and large-scale mass production, with flexible minimum order quantities starting from 50 units.
items.question: What are your minimum order quantities?

items.answer: Standard lead times range from 2-4 weeks depending on complexity and volume. Custom projects are evaluated individually for precise timelines.
items.question: What are your typical production lead times?

items.answer: We are ISO 9001:2015 and ISO 14001:2015 certified, ensuring consistent high-quality manufacturing and environmental management standards.
items.question: What quality certifications do you have?

items.answer: We specialize in brass, stainless steel, aluminum, and copper, providing comprehensive machining solutions across multiple material types.
